title: Enchanting Pearl and Emerald Grandeur: A Diamond-Studded Haaram
materials: South Sea Pearls (33.30 ct). Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance. Locket contains: diamonds
emerald and pearls. Gold weight 7.18 dwt
features: Intricate floral and paisley motifs encrusted with dazzling diamonds create a breathtaking design. Features two Ruby gemstones and two Emerald gemstones. The central pendant showcases a magnificent Zambian Emerald, surrounded by an array of diamonds. Pearl drops delicately dangle along the neckline and on the locket, adding a touch of classic elegance. Masterfully handcrafted by skilled artisans with generations of expertise, this piece exemplifies the timeless beauty of South Indian jewelry.
colors: and creamy white pearls create a luxurious and harmonious color palette.
occasions: Perfect for a grand Indian wedding (Vivahaalu)
festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for milestone birthday celebrations or anniversaries.
description: This exquisite Haaram is a true heirloom piece, blending traditional South Indian artistry with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality gemstones, impeccable craftsmanship, and classic pearl accents ensure this necklace will be treasured for generations. Its opulent design and vibrant colors make it a show-stopping piece, perfect for the discerning bride or jewelry collector. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and pearls is considered highly auspicious in South Indian culture, symbolizing prosperity, fertility, and happiness.
